      • getTemplateList

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public com.tmg.ebscore.dto.template.TemplateContainer<com.tmg.ebscore.dto.template.TemplateSummaryData> getTemplateList(int page,
                                                                                                                             int maxResults)
                                                                                                                 throws com.tmg.ebscore.orm.DataAccessException
        Parameters:
        page - corresponding page no.
        maxResults - Maximum no. rows displayed in a page.
        Returns:
        TemplateContainer It returns the list of all TemplateSummaryData objects, PagesCount, TotalItems.
        Throws:
        com.tmg.ebscore.orm.DataAccessException -

        This method retrieve the list of all available Template list their work flow state, No of packages for specific Template. This method also return the total number of released and unreleased package version for for a specific template.

        Whenever user create a new template the workflowstate must be set from available workflowstate in template level. This method provide the list of available workflowstate.
